sentence.Network_en: The grassland of West Sichuan is abundant in plant resources, including Descurainia sophia.
sentence.Network_cn: 川西草原的十字花科植物资源比较丰富, 如特用油料植物播娘蒿等.

means.word_mean: 1. includes annual or biennial herbs of America and Europe very similar to and often included among those of genera Sisymbrium or Hugueninia; not recognized in some classification systems
